name: Kessler Effect (itch)
description:
Runaway Kessler syndrome, caused by putting too much junk into orbit means we are literally running out of space! Help clean the place up by sweeping space debris into the collector. But watch out! The collector craft can only hold so much before it explodes. Try to earn as much profit as you can before running out of space! 

An entry for the 2021 Epic MegaJam - https://itch.io/jam/2021-epic-megajam

Controls: Keyboard and mouse: 
  • WASD - Move 
  • QE - Rotate
Gamepad:
  • Right Thumbstick - Move
  • Left Thumbstick - Rotate
